content: The folder will be permanently deleted in 30 days.

comment.text: This text informs the user about the permanent deletion timeline for a folder. It appears within a dialog, likely a deletion confirmation dialog, to explain that the folder will be permanently deleted after a 30-day grace period. Translators should ensure the timeframe remains accurate and culturally appropriate.

usage.context: {{ name: selection[0]?.title }} to {{ trashSection: t("Common:TrashSection") }}. {" "} {!isThirdParty ? isFolder ? t("FolderDeletedAfter") : t("FileDeletedAfter") : null}{" "} {t("Common:WantToContinue")} );
